snippet: The Knicks are 3-0 for the first time since 1999, but over the next 10 days, the team will be resting and practicing far more often than playing games.
abstract: New York Knicks, 3-0 for first time since 1999, play down potential for disrupted rhythm on the court as their schedule lightens up.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are 3-0 for the first time since 1999, but over the next 10 days, the team will be resting and practicing far more often than playing games.

headline.main: After Their Fast Start, Knicks Have Plenty of Idle Time
headline.print_headline: After Their Fast Start, Knicks Have Plenty of Idle Time
